title: No Sound

title: Memories
text:
This app is a joke. I am unsure of how it happened. But my memories are broken. Whenever I try to post a memory from my stories from years ago Snapchat posts it as a BRAND NEW SNAP. It doesn’t have the 2 years ago today in the top left hand corner. I had absolutely NO idea it was doing this until I posted a pic of my dog. Who passed away 6 years ago, and I kept getting messages of condolences..I was so freaking confused. I went to look and sure enough my “memory” posted as a brand new Snapchat. 

I’ve reported this. Over and over and OVER again. I’ve uninstalled. I’ve reinstalled. I’ve logged out updated my password and logged back in. I EVEN USED MY LAPTOP. And same freaking thing. 

What is the point of us reporting your bugs IF YOU DONT FIX THEM?? God do better

title: Locked my acc and ip banned me
text: I have had this app for close to 6-7 years now and I have had soooo much memories on this app with my friends and my streaks but I was outside having a fun time and I check my snap to see what going on with my friends just checking up to be fr and I get this note say I have been locked out basically kick me out and getting rid of my account and made a appeal and waited 25+ days and guess what they just did hit me back up and just got rid of the acc all the memories since I was 8 years old are gone. I love the app but this is just wrong and I got in a fight with someone and I believe they spam reported me and they really believe them deleting my acc before even let me appeal😔👎🤦🏾‍♂️
